/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of a clear blue sky. The sun, high in the heavens, casts a bright light that illuminates the scene. The street is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along the road, their colors muted under the sunlight. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, construction cranes hint at the ongoing development and progress of the city. The image is taken from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up at the towering buildings and the expansive sky. The perspective is panoramic, offering a wide view of the cityscape.
